data.text: @drewmonson7 @sohobabyy I’ve been continually having headaches pretty much all day since I had that COVID shit like 3 weeks ago…fuckin sucks

@drewmonson7 @sohobabyy There are no cures for either of these, and me/cfs is severely underfunded and massly misunderstood. I'm so glad that someone with your platform knows about LC!! Please continue to spread awareness 🥰

@drewmonson7 @sohobabyy To expand on this: there's around a 10% chance that 6+ months of Long Covid will escalate to me/cfs. Me/cfs is a disabling neurological disease and chronic illness (I have it) and has existed for decades. We have tons of information on this, so LC has a hopeful advantage.
@drewmonson7 OMG did the Robert actually say THIS 😰😰😰😨😨😱
@drewmonson7 thank u for explaining jesus that sounds like hell oh my god
@pixieeelocks @drewmonson7 DUH!! how could i forget thank you for reminding me

@sohobabyy it's this thing where you have lingering symptoms after getting covid and they are vey unsure of the severity of it and how it will impact us long term, from what ive seen. people are already having a lot of horrible mental and physical things even from mild cases and omnircron
@drewmonson7 I can't believe he said that smh
